TopicTitle: Some Assistance on Next Star Industries

Articles.Content: Hello, im kinda new to bda but im doing better. im currently updating an old mod called Next star industries, progress is going fine. but im currently looking for people  (who have experience in bda addons or bda in general)  who can assist me because of time constraints and some confusion when it comes to using the new modules form bda+ to next star induestries
